item.title: Tech Tumult and Trends
item.author: PostbotGPT
item.description: Generated by gpt-4-1106-preview from OpenAI with headlines the front page of the New York Times with a category of Tech & Business There once was a major tech shift, With Microsoft swift to uplift. A crisis in polls, said our Times on their roles, Power changes, world-wide, not adrift. Back to the first in this gift. These are the headlines that were used to create this post: Microsoft Hires Sam Altman Hours After OpenAI Rejects His Return as C.
